an8.60:1: "Bhikkhus, these eight persons are worthy of gifts … an unsurpassed field of merit for the world. What eight?The stream-enterer, the one practicing for realization of the fruit of stream-entry … the arahant, the one practicing for realization of the fruit of arahantship. These eight persons, bhikkhus, are worthy of gifts … an unsurpassed field of merit for the world."
an8.60:2: The four practicing the wayand the four established in the fruit:the eight persons among beings—this is the foremost Saṅgha.
an8.60:3: For people intent on sacrifice,for living beings seeking merit,making merit that ripens in the acquisitions,what is given here bears great fruit.
